metadata.title: prAna Women's Jordi Jacket
features: prAna Living Women's Jordi Jacket, Raisin, Medium
description: The Jordi Jacket adds a feminine touch to rainwear with a longer length and ruffled hem that create a faintly dress like appearance. Water resistance and a breathable finish ensure that you will stay comfortably dry in the next shower. Outer snap pockets and an interior zip pocket with a media port provide space for your necessaries.
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "1 x 1 x 1 inches; 1 Pounds", "Department": "Womens", "Date First Available": "November 1, 2013", "Manufacturer": "Prana"}
